newsArray.title: National chess players move to semi-final
creator: Ayman
newsArray.description: Two Cambodian national chess players have made it to the semi-finals of the 5-minute men’s singles category over the weekend. The post National chess players move to semi-final appeared first on Khmer Times.
newsArray.content: Two Cambodian national chess players have made it to the semi-finals of the 5-minute men’s singles category over the weekend. Sok Limheng and Nou Chanphanit have both qualified for the semi-finals having come out on top of their group stage matches. Chess, football, and cricket are three sports that started their competition over the weekend, one week earlier than the official opening of the 32nd Southeast Asian (SEA) Games on May 5. The chess competition is being held at the Royal University of Phnom Penh (RUPP) where students, reporters, and fans saw the matches. Sok Limheng is a Group A player which included participants from Thailand, Vietnam, Myanmar, the Philippines, and Laos. Limheng won four of five matches which kept him at the top of the group. Limheng and the Vietnamese players also qualified for the semifinals. While Chanphanit is in Group B, and he won four of five matches and stood at the top his group. Chanphanit qualified for the next round alongside a Vietnamese player. The 5-minute men’s singles category’s semi and final round will be held on May 6 at the RUPP. Chess fans cheered the two players and hopes are running high that these two players can win the first medals at the Games. Limheng was a chess champion at Angkor Sangkranta 2023, where he beat former champion Chheav Bora. The chess competition will run from April 29 to May 9. It is divided into five categories which are 5-minute singles, 60-minute quadruples, 60-minute doubles, 60-minute triples, and 60-minute singles. There are five days to go until the official opening of the 32nd SEA Games which will be held at Morodok Techo Stadium. The opening ceremony team has been rehearsing tirelessly to ensure a smooth performance at the opening and closing ceremonies. This is the first time for Cambodia to host this big event. However, the Kingdom has further affirmed its commitment to provide the best experience for both fans and athletes.

newsArray.title: Liverpool 4 Tottenham 3: Jota scores last-gasp winner after incredible Spurs fightback all-but ending top four hopes
creator: Tom Barclay
newsArray.content: ONLY Tottenham could come from three goals down after 15 minutes, net an equaliser deep into injury-time, and still lose the game. Richarlison thought he had sealed a truly phenomenal comeback when heading home his first Premier League goal for Spurs in the 93rd minute to make it 3-3. 8 Curtis Jones gave Liverpool a very early lead over Tottenham Credit: Alamy 8 Luis Diaz netted moments later to double the home side's advantage Credit: Alamy 8 Mo Salah added another from the penalty spot Credit: PA 8 Harry Kane pulled one back for Tottenham before half-time Credit: Reuters 8 Son Heung-min grabbed another for Spurs Credit: Reuters 8 Richarlison thought he had earned Spurs a point in stoppage time Credit: AFP 8 Diogo Jota bagged a remarkable winner in the dying seconds Credit: Getty Yet seconds later, fellow sub Diogo Jota struck at the other end of the pitch to break Spurs’ hearts. It was a truly bonkers afternoon that for all the amazing goalmouth entertainment showed how both sides are shadows of the ones that contested the Champions League final four years ago. Spurs’ players will have been bracing themselves for another whip-round to refund supporters after a quarter of an hour here, when quickfire goals from Curtis Jones and Luis Diaz, plus a Mo Salah penalty, put Liverpool 3-0 up. It was arguably just as bad, if not numerically so, as Newcastle away last week when they shipped five after 21 minutes and the squad ended up reimbursing their poor travelling fans. By the 93rd minute, Tottenham’s team suddenly looked amazing value for money as they struck back through Harry Kane, Son Heung-min and Richarlison. But Jota ensured Ryan Mason’s side, for all their fight after their horrendous start, still had that familiar sinking feeling come full time. Chairman Daniel Levy watched on as the away fans sang songs once again urging him to quit and for their money back after the shocking first 15. Some Spurs supporters even walked out of Anfield at that point, no doubt fearing another cricket score after their terrorising on Tyneside. Most read in Football 'brutal' 'Killer' fiance's dog decision sparks fears teacher's murder was 'pre-planned' 'HIGH RISK' Police union chiefs accuse TV companies of causing carnage after footie matches MONEY MISERY Pals of builder who won £105million on EuroMillions reveal his secret misery HOMEWARD BOUND Dog escapes new home ‘and walks 40 miles back to family who got rid of him’ FREE BETS AND SIGN UP DEALS - BEST NEW CUSTOMER OFFERS What they missed was one of the games of the season - though they will console themselves with the fact they did not have to witness Jota’s dagger to the heart. Ryan Mason, the interim who replaced the interim after caretaker chief Cristian Stellini was axed for the shellacking at Newcastle, must have felt all kinds of emotions after what his side had gone through. The stark fact is though they are down to sixth, level on points with Aston Villa, and only two ahead of in-form Brighton who have three games in hand. There is a distinct possibility Tottenham will not qualify for Europe at all this season. Whereas Liverpool - where Eurovision will be held in May - have football on the continent very much in their sights after four successive victories. This win, as unconvincing as it was in totality, lifted them up to fifth in the league, though a top-four spot looks surely out of reach with Newcastle and Manchester United too far ahead. Ex-Liverpool and Spurs man Graeme Souness on punditry said this game provided an opportunity for players to fight for their club futures. For Tottenham, he meant pretty much all of them given the way their season has collapsed. For the hosts, the Scot was talking more specifically about young midfielders Jones and Harvey Elliott, given the centre of the park is where Liverpool so obviously need reinforcement. But England Under-21 man Jones showed just why he deserves to be part of the future at Anfield with the opener inside three minutes, carefully firing home a controlled volley inside three minutes after ghosting in behind Pedro Porro. The academy product was teed up by fellow local lad Trent Alexander-Arnold, taking his Premier League assist tally to SIX for April. That compares to just three before then all season for the ultra-creative full-back, who has been stepping into midfield more this month as Jurgen Klopp looked to follow Manchester City’s lead to reverse his side’s fortunes. It was a nightmare start for Mason - and it got even worse two minutes later. Diaz was surprisingly handed his first start since October having finally recovered from a serious knee injury. The Colombian, who Spurs tried to buy in January 2022 only to be beaten to his signature by Liverpool, brilliantly diverted a volley in at the near post after Cody Gakpo had cut it back. Cristian Romero got nowhere near Diaz and it was the Argentine World Cup winner who was at fault again for the third as he senselessly felled Gakpo in the area. Salah had missed his last two spot-kicks but made no mistake this time, clipping it down the middle. It took the Egyptian king to 184 Liverpool goals on what was his 300th appearance, moving him one clear of Robbie Fowler’s Reds haul. His strike sparked an exodus from a number of Spurs fans, with Gary Neville on commentary joking that Spurs’ players should set up a direct debit to reimburse them again after their Geordie horrorshow. At that point you feared another cricket score but then this Liverpool side have their own failings too, with Klopp admitting a rebuild is needed in the summer. Their frailties showed when Spurs netted one and perhaps could have had two more before the break. Dejan Kulusevski could have scored, Son should have scored and the reliable Kane finally did score as he buried Ivan Perisic’s excellent cross. It took the England captain to 25 Premier League goals for the season and 208 overall - level with Wayne Rooney. And it left the away fans - those that did stay, at least - with a weird sense of optimism going into the second half. The visitors were a whisker away from reducing the deficit further after it with Son and Romero both hitting the woodwork. That pair combined with 13 minutes to go though as Romero clipped a ball through to Son who fired past Alisson to make for an intriguing finish. A nervy Liverpool were lucky not to go down to ten men too when sub Diogo Jota caught Oliver Skipp with a high boot that left the Spurs man bleeding from the head. The hosts breathed a sigh of relief when Richarlison was denied a penalty when Ibrahima Konate held him back. Read more on the Scottish Sun FAME SHAME I was a 90s pop star, I had six top 40 hits but only made £200 a week down-sizing I'm forcing my 'annoying' ex-pal neighbour to demolish £80k build over 2 INCHES But the Brazilian still had time to head home what he thought was a point-saver as he converted Son’s free-kick before ripping off his shirt and leaping into the crowd in celebration. Yet there was still to be another sting in the tail, as Jota kept his cool to fire past Fraser Forster, erupt Anfield and leave Spurs devastated once again. 8 Jurgen Klopp watched his side grind out an entertaining win over Spurs Credit: Alamy

newsArray.title: यह क्रिकेट की प्रकृति है," पाकिस्तान के खिलाफ न्यूजीलैंड के कैच छोड़ने पर टॉम लैथम
creator: Gulabi Jagat
newsArray.content: रावलपिंडी (एएनआई): टॉम लेथम की न्यूजीलैंड पाकिस्तान के खिलाफ पांच मैचों की एकदिवसीय श्रृंखला में अपनी पहली जीत हासिल कर सकती थी, लेकिन कुछ कैच छूटने से उन्हें सपाट सतह पर चोट लगी। डेरिल मिशेल के बल्ले से 129 (119) की शानदार पारी के बाद न्यूजीलैंड ने पाकिस्तान के लिए 337 रनों का प्रतिस्पर्धी स्कोर बनाया, हालांकि, फखर जमान ने मेजबानों के लिए जीत हासिल करने के लिए पाकिस्तान के लिए कदम बढ़ाया। "डेरिल ने एक शानदार पारी खेली। आधे रास्ते में हम बहुत खुश थे। फखर को पूरा श्रेय, एक शानदार पारी खेली। यह क्रिकेट की प्रकृति है, होता है (गिरे हुए कैच के बारे में बात करना)। वे साझेदारी के बाद साझेदारी बनाने में सक्षम थे। बिग टिक बल्लेबाजी विभाग में। पिछले कुछ मैचों में अच्छा प्रदर्शन किया है। यहां विकेट सपाट होते हैं। हमें बीच के चरणों में अधिक मौके बनाने होंगे, "टॉम लेथम ने मैच के बाद कहा। एक उच्च स्कोर वाले खेल में, खेल के दौरान कई रिकॉर्ड टूट गए, जिसमें फखर एकदिवसीय मैचों में तीन सीधे शतक बनाने वाले चौथे पाकिस्तानी बल्लेबाज बने और 3000 एकदिवसीय रन बनाने वाले देश के सबसे तेज खिलाड़ी बने। पाकिस्तान का कुल 337/3 भी एक वनडे में पाकिस्तान की पुरुष टीम द्वारा चौथा सबसे बड़ा एकदिवसीय स्कोर था और उनका दूसरा सर्वश्रेष्ठ रन चेज था। मिचेल की दस्तक में आठ चौके और तीन छक्के थे, और उनका स्कोर, जो 1998 में रिकी पोंटिंग के 124 * को पार कर गया था, जो किसी मेहमान देश के किसी भी नंबर 3 बल्लेबाज द्वारा सर्वश्रेष्ठ के रूप में पाकिस्तान में एकदिवसीय मैच में एक न्यूजीलैंडर द्वारा सबसे अधिक था। पाकिस्तान की कोशिश 3 मई को कराची के नेशनल स्टेडियम में होने वाले वनडे सीरीज के तीसरे मैच में सीरीज अपने नाम करने की होगी . (एएनआई)

newsArray.title: Pakistan Shaheens departs for Zimbabwe tour
creator: A Sports
newsArray.description: LAHORE: Imran Butt-led Pakistan Shaheens departed for Zimbabwe in the wee hours of Sunday to feature to play two four-dayers and six 50-over matches. The matches will be staged in Harare, Kwekwe and Mutare from 3 to 27 May. Prior to their departure, Pakistan Shaheens had finalized their preparation in a two-day camp at the […] The post Pakistan Shaheens departs for Zimbabwe tour appeared first on ASports.tv.
newsArray.content: LAHORE: Imran Butt-led Pakistan Shaheens departed for Zimbabwe in the wee hours of Sunday to feature to play two four-dayers and six 50-over matches. The matches will be staged in Harare, Kwekwe and Mutare from 3 to 27 May. Prior to their departure, Pakistan Shaheens had finalized their preparation in a two-day camp at the National Cricket Academy in Lahore on 28 and 29 April before going through an 11-day camp at the Hanif Muhammad High Performance Centre in Karachi. The squad includes 16 players and four reserve players. Six players apart from the captain and Test cricketer Imran Butt have already represented Pakistan in international cricket. Other internationally capped players include Hussain Talat (1 ODI, 18 T20Is), Kamran Ghulam (1 ODI), Mir Hamza (3 Tests), Mohammad Ali (2 Tests), Shahnawaz Dahani (2 ODIs, 11 T20Is) and Saim Ayub (8 T20Is). “We have had a rigorous training camp for the Pakistan Shaheens team ahead of our tour to Zimbabwe. The players have put in a lot of hard work and effort to prepare for this important series.” said team skipper Imran Butt. “The side consists of experienced and young players. We have some very talented individuals in the side who are eager to showcase their skills on the international stage. “The team is in good spirits and looking forward to the challenge of playing in Zimbabwe. We are confident that we have the right mix of players to put up a strong performance.” Pakistan Shaheens: Imran Butt (captain) (Lahore), Hussain Talat (vice-captain) (Lahore), Aamir Jamal (Islamabad), Abdul Wahid Bangalzai (Quetta), Haseebullah (Quetta), Kamran Ghulam (Peshawar), Mehran Mumtaz (Rawalpindi), Mir Hamza (Karachi), Mohammad Ali (Sialkot), Mohammad Huraira (Sialkot), Mubasir Khan (Islamabad), Omair Bin Yousuf (Karachi), Qasim Akram (Lahore), Rohail Nazir (wicketkeeper) (Islamabad) and Shahnawaz Dahani (Larkana). Saim Ayub (Karachi, 50-over matches only). Asif Mehmood (Hyderabad), Athar Mehmood (Gujranwala), Saad Khan (Hyderabad) and Waqar Ahmad (Peshawar) (all reserves) Player Support Personnel – Aizaz Cheema (coach), Imran Abbas (manager), Saboor Ahmed (trainer), Muhammad Asad (physiotherapist) and Faisal Rai (team analyst). Abdul Rehman (Team Consultant, for 50-over matches only) Tour schedule: 3-6 May – 1st Four-day match; KSC, Kwekwe 10- 13 May – 2nd Four-day match; MSC, Mutare 17 May – 1st 50-over match; TSC, Harare 19 May – 2nd 50-over match; HSC, Harare 21 May – 3rd 50-over match; HSC, Harare 23 May – 4th 50-over match; OH, Harare 25 May – 5th 50-over match; HSC, Harare 27 May – 6th 50-over match; HSC, Harare READ: PAK vs NZ: Fakhar credits Babar Azam for his marathon innings The post Pakistan Shaheens departs for Zimbabwe tour appeared first on ASports.tv.

newsArray.title: डेवोन कॉनवे ने टी20 क्रिकेट में पूरे किए 5000 रन, ऐसा करने वाले तीसरे सबसे तेज खिलाड़ी बने
creator: Gulabi Jagat
newsArray.content: चेन्नई (एएनआई): न्यूजीलैंड और चेन्नई सुपर किंग्स (सीएसके) के बल्लेबाज डेवोन कॉनवे ने टी-20 क्रिकेट में 5,000 रन पूरे किए। रविवार को चेन्नई में पंजाब किंग्स (पीबीकेएस) के खिलाफ सीएसके के इंडियन प्रीमियर लीग 2023 मैच के दौरान इस बल्लेबाज ने इसे पूरा किया। मैच में, कॉनवे ने केवल 52 गेंदों में 92* रनों की अविश्वसनीय पारी खेली। उनकी पारी में 16 चौके और एक छक्का शामिल था। उनके रन 176.92 की स्ट्राइक रेट से आए। अब 149 मैचों और 144 पारियों में कॉनवे ने 44.02 की औसत से 5,063 रन बनाए हैं। उन्होंने 105 * के सर्वश्रेष्ठ स्कोर के साथ प्रारूप में दो शतक और 40 अर्धशतक बनाए हैं। पारी के संदर्भ में, कॉनवे छोटे प्रारूप में 5,000 रन के आंकड़े तक पहुंचने वाले तीसरे सबसे तेज खिलाड़ी हैं। ऐसा करने वाले सबसे तेज बल्लेबाज वेस्टइंडीज के महान बल्लेबाज क्रिस गेल (132 पारियां), उसके बाद केएल राहुल (143 पारियां) और उसके बाद कॉनवे हैं। ऑस्ट्रेलियाई बल्लेबाज शॉन मार्श और पाकिस्तान के बाबर आज़म ने भी 144 पारियों में 5,000 रन पूरे किए हैं। उन्होंने 38 T20I में न्यूजीलैंड का प्रतिनिधित्व किया है, जिसमें उन्होंने 130 से अधिक की स्ट्राइक रेट से 45.70 की औसत से 1,234 रन बनाए हैं। उन्होंने कीवी टीम के लिए प्रारूप में नौ अर्धशतक बनाए हैं, जिसमें उनका सर्वश्रेष्ठ स्कोर 99* है। . कॉनवे ने 16 आईपीएल मैच भी खेले हैं। इन मैचों में उन्होंने 16 पारियों में 47.17 की औसत से 666 रन बनाए हैं। उन्होंने 92 * के सर्वश्रेष्ठ स्कोर के साथ, फ्रैंचाइज़ी के लिए आठ अर्धशतक बनाए हैं। उन्होंने घरेलू क्रिकेट में वेलिंगटन के लिए 37 टी20 मैच भी खेले हैं, जिसमें उन्होंने 61 की औसत से 1,587 रन बनाए हैं। उन्होंने टीम के लिए 105 के सर्वश्रेष्ठ स्कोर के साथ दो शतक और 11 अर्द्धशतक बनाए हैं। कॉनवे ने इंग्लैंड काउंटी समरसेट के लिए आठ मैच भी खेले हैं, जिसमें उन्होंने 59 की औसत से तीन अर्धशतकों के साथ 295 रन बनाए हैं। टी20 क्रिकेट में सर्वाधिक रन बनाने वाले शीर्ष पांच खिलाड़ी हैं: क्रिस गेल (14,562 रन), शोएब मलिक (12,528 रन), कीरोन पोलार्ड (12,175 रन), विराट कोहली (11,659 रन) और डेविड वार्नर (11,485 रन)। मैच में आते ही, कॉनवे (92 *) और रुतुराज गायकवाड़ (31 गेंदों में 37) ने अपने 20 ओवरों में CSK को 200/4 करने के लिए 86 रनों की साझेदारी की। शिवम दूबे (17 गेंदों में 28) और एमएस धोनी (चार गेंदों में 13 *) का कैमियो भी उपयोगी साबित हुआ। अर्शदीप सिंह, सैम कुर्रन, राहुल चाहर और सिकंदर रजा को एक-एक विकेट मिला। (एएनआई)

newsArray.title: हमें टूर्नामेंट में जिंदा रहने के लिए आने वाले हफ्तों में अच्छी क्रिकेट खेलनी होगी, विश्वास है कि हम यह कर सकते हैं: डीसी मिशेल मार्श
creator: Gulabi Jagat
newsArray.content: नई दिल्ली (एएनआई): इंडियन प्रीमियर लीग (आईपीएल) 2023 के अपने मैच में सनराइजर्स हैदराबाद से नौ रन की हार के बाद, दिल्ली की राजधानियों के ऑलराउंडर मिशेल मार्श ने कहा कि उनकी टीम को अभी भी एक बड़ा विश्वास है कि वे कुछ अच्छा क्रिकेट खेल सकते हैं। आने वाले हफ्तों में टूर्नामेंट में जिंदा रहने के लिए। शनिवार को अरुण जेटली स्टेडियम, दिल्ली में सनराइजर्स हैदराबाद के खिलाफ एक करीबी मुकाबले में दिल्ली की राजधानियों को नौ रन से हार का सामना करना पड़ा। 198 के लक्ष्य का पीछा करते हुए, दिल्ली की राजधानियाँ करीब आ गईं, लेकिन नौ रन से चूक गईं। मैच के बारे में बात करते हुए, मिचेल मार्श, जिन्होंने गेंद के साथ 4/27 और बल्ले से 39 गेंदों पर 63 रनों का शानदार ऑल-राउंड प्रदर्शन किया, ने टीम की एक प्रेस विज्ञप्ति के हवाले से कहा, "यह बहुत निराशाजनक था हम हमेशा टी20 क्रिकेट में छोटे अंतर के बारे में बात करते हैं और शायद कुछ ऐसे क्षेत्र थे जहां हमने खुद को निराश किया लेकिन फिर भी समूह पर गर्व है और समूह में बहुत अधिक विश्वास है।" अपने व्यक्तिगत प्रदर्शन के बारे में बात करते हुए, ऑस्ट्रेलियाई ऑलराउंडर ने कहा, "मैं अपनी गेंदबाजी को बहुत सरल रखने की कोशिश करता हूं। मैं वास्तव में अपनी भूमिका के बारे में स्पष्ट हूं। मैं अपने कटर और धीमी गेंदों के साथ विकेट का उपयोग अपने फायदे के लिए करने की कोशिश करता हूं। आपको हमेशा जरूरत होती है।" टी20 क्रिकेट में थोड़ा भाग्य, खासकर मेरी भूमिका के साथ। लेकिन थोड़ी सी मेहनत का अच्छा इनाम।" "यह फिल के साथ एक महान साझेदारी थी। मैंने पहली बार उसके साथ बल्लेबाजी की और मैंने वास्तव में इसका आनंद लिया। इस पूरे टूर्नामेंट में कई बार अब तक हमने शुरुआती विकेट गंवाए हैं, इसलिए हमारे लिए एक मंच स्थापित करने में सक्षम होना अच्छा था, लेकिन दुर्भाग्य से लेकिन, बल्ले से योगदान करने में सक्षम होना बहुत सुखद था और उम्मीद है, मैं कुछ और जीत में योगदान कर सकता हूं, "मार्श ने कहा, जिन्होंने फिल साल्ट के साथ 112 रनों की ठोस साझेदारी की। अब तक के समग्र अभियान पर विचार करते हुए मार्श ने कहा, "यह बहुत कठिन है। मुझे लगता है कि हर कोई इस बात को लेकर अपनी निराशा साझा करता है कि चीजें अभी तक हमारे अनुसार नहीं हुई हैं। लेकिन, हमारे पास बहुत से युवा हैं जो कुछ मूल्यवान अनुभव प्राप्त कर रहे हैं।" इस स्तर पर खेलना, जो दिल्ली को भविष्य के लिए भी अच्छी स्थिति में रखेगा।" "हम अभी भी टूर्नामेंट में जीवित हैं लेकिन हमें अगले कुछ हफ्तों में कुछ बहुत अच्छी क्रिकेट खेलनी होगी। यह अभी भी है और हमें समूह में बहुत विश्वास है कि हम इसे कर सकते हैं," उन्होंने निष्कर्ष निकाला। पहले बल्लेबाजी करने के लिए, SRH ने अपने 20 ओवरों में 197/6 पोस्ट किया, अभिषेक शर्मा (36 गेंदों में 12 चौकों और एक छक्के की मदद से 67) और हेनरिक क्लासेन (27 गेंदों में 53 *, दो चौकों की मदद से 53 *) के अर्धशतकों से संचालित। चार छक्के)। मिचेल मार्श (4/27) डीसी के लिए गेंदबाजों में से एक थे। 198 के पीछा में, कप्तान डेविड वार्नर के डक के लिए गिरने के बाद, फिल सॉल्ट (35 गेंदों में 59 रन) और मार्श (63) ने डीसी को दूसरे विकेट के लिए 112 रनों की साझेदारी के साथ पीछा करने के लिए एक शानदार मंच प्रदान किया। , लेकिन डीसी ने कुछ शुरुआती विकेट खो दिए और एक्सर पटेल के नाबाद 29 रन के बावजूद जीत से चूक गए। मयंक मार्कंडे 2/20 के स्पेल के साथ SRH के लिए गेंदबाज थे। मार्श को उनके हरफनमौला प्रदर्शन के लिए 'प्लेयर ऑफ द मैच' का पुरस्कार दिया गया। डीसी दो जीत और छह हार के साथ अंक तालिका में सबसे नीचे है। उनके नाम केवल चार अंक हैं। दूसरी ओर, SRH तीन जीत और पांच हार के साथ तालिका में आठवें स्थान पर है। उनके कुल छह अंक हैं। दिल्ली कैपिटल्स अपने अगले मैच में मंगलवार को अहमदाबाद के नरेंद्र मोदी स्टेडियम में गुजरात टाइटंस से भिड़ेगी। (एएनआई)

newsArray.title: PAK vs NZ: Fakhar credits Babar Azam for his marathon innings
creator: A Sports
newsArray.description: RAWALPINDI: Imperious Fakhar Zaman has credited skipper Babar Azam for his longer stays on the crease helping him to finish the job for his team after he led Pakistan to a convincing win in the second match of the PAK vs NZ ODI series. The left-hander played a match-winning knock of 180 not out to […] The post PAK vs NZ: Fakhar credits Babar Azam for his marathon innings appeared first on ASports.tv.
newsArray.content: The left-hander played a match-winning not out to help his side chase down the massive 337-run target in the second ODI against New Zealand at the Pindi Cricket Stadium on Saturday. It was the second-highest run chase by the Men in Green in ODI history. Pakistan star opener disclosed that he was able to bat till the last because of Babar’s time-to-time interventions to calm his nerves. “After every over Babar was sending me a message to stand (solid) and not to go hard,” he said in a post-match interview. “Even when he was batting (with me), he never asked me to go for runs. He was just asking to take singles and double, and if needed he himself would take the risk.” Moreover, Fakhar said the skipper tried his best to keep him under control even when he was stubborn to take the risk. “We all know how big a player he is. He is always calm and does not take the pressure. I told him that I would take the risk if the run rate goes beyond seven, no matter what you say. Even then he kept asking me to remain calm since the target is very much achievable on this wicket ” he told. Talking about the role Babar plays during his marathon innings, Fakhar claimed if he was not there to soothe his nerves it would not have been possible for him to go that far. “Even in the last match when I was batting in the 80s, I told the umpire if Babar had not been there I would’ve either completed my century or been sitting in the dressing room,” he added. It must be noted here that Fakhar’s blitzkrieg the other day is the highest score by any Pakistan batter in a successful run chase. The 33-year-old registered a host of individual records in the match as he became the fastest batter not just from the country but from Asia to complete 3000 ODI runs and just the fourth Pakistani to hit three consecutive centuries in the format. Fakhar’s back-to-back centuries at Pindi Cricket Stadium, took Pakistan to a 2-0 lead in the series as he outshone New Zealand’s Daryl Mitchell for the second time in a row. The two sides will now take on each other in the third fixture of the five-match ODI series at the National Bank Cricket Arena as the action shifts to Karachi, which will host the remaining three ODIs on May 3, 5 and 7.
